body:
I have some concerns about this:

1. Do you want to just specify a list of preferences that get sent? We will have to ship client updates every time this list changes.

2. We might want to consider whitelist the domains that are sent this data. Otherwise, any domain we link to from a Heartbeat prompt will get this data in the query string.

3. I'd like us to get approval from a privacy steward (data steward? I can never remember the title) for sharing this data before we consider implementing this, specifically because heartbeat prompts can send users to arbitrary domains rather than only Mozilla-controlled domains, depending on the recipe configuration.

I have some concerns about this:

  1. Do you want to just specify a list of preferences that get sent? We will have to ship client updates every time this list changes.

  2. We might want to consider whitelist the domains that are sent this data. Otherwise, any domain we link to from a Heartbeat prompt will get this data in the query string.

  3. I'd like us to get approval from a privacy steward (data steward? I can never remember the title) for sharing this data before we consider implementing this, specifically because heartbeat prompts can send users to arbitrary domains rather than only Mozilla-controlled domains, depending on the recipe configuration.
